channel.title: "Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer" random crash @ Office Complex
channel.description:
This has only happened once, but I figured I should post it here. Right when the scientist says "There's no way I can jump across that shaft. I failed P.E.", while climbing up the ladder, I got an error:
"Engine Error
Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (32770>32768 ) Tell a programmer to up the VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE."
Thanks
